description: Try these baked potato chips with parmesan and parsley for a healthier snack. These crispy homemade chips are perfect for those afternoon hunger pangs.
keywords: Chips & fries,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Healthier Easier,Video,Low sugar,Baking,Potato,High protein,Wheat free,Jan Feb 2022,Low fat
name: Baked Potato Chips With Parsley & Parmesan Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 washed white potatoes, cut into 2mm-thick slices
2 sprigs continental parsley, leaves picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line a large baking tray with baking paper.
Place potato in a large bowl and cover with cold water. Stand for 15 minutes. Drain. Pat dry with paper towels. Return to dry bowl. Spray with oil and toss to coat.
Arrange potato, in a single layer, on tray. Bake for 30 minutes or until golden and crisp. Season with pepper. Serve sprinkled with parmesan and parsley.
